figure_1.title: Figure 1. Failure modes and effects analysis process.

claims.sentence: The FMEA combines brainstorming by team members and flowcharting to create a detailed process map with potential breakdowns or failure modes noted, ranked, and corrective action identified (Figure 1; Dailey, 2004).
